title: (Fri Early Bird) Updates on Everyone’s TV Adventures + Bobby’s Mailbag: Boyfriend Won’t Let Me Listen to the Bobby Bones Show
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Updates on Everyone’s TV Adventures + Bobby’s Mailbag: Boyfriend Won’t Let Me Listen to the Bobby Bones Show
description:
We start the show with an update on Lunchbox, Morgan and Raymundo’s TV adventures. Who will make it on to TV first? In the mailbag, Bobby helps a listener whose boyfriend of 2 years will not let her listen to our show. Plus, Fun Fact Friday and Easy Trivia!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
